data.text: @capebretonpost why is the roommate even in the hospital...they don't believe in self help or science
@capebretonpost My husband is in Palliative Care for the same reason. Unreal!!  I’m so sorry.

@HHmcd4 @capebretonpost Cases don’t matter. Hospitalizations do and they are not significantly increasing due to majority being vaccinated, virtually all immune compromised being vaccinated and the variant being more like the common flu. This has been known for months.
@capebretonpost Unvaxxed and vaccinated can spread the virus. This has been known for close to a year. Why are you still participating in these misleading claims? This is seriously embarrassing.

@capebretonpost OMG!  It looks like we are about to loose all of those compromises we made to keep us safe for so long!  Its winter in Canada and we are not out and about as much look out for the counts in May etc.  The counts of those with covid have been going up, fully vacd helps!
